results.content: Fantastic course, enjoyed it and learned some great new tech
results.content_html: Fantastic course, enjoyed it and learned some great new tech

results.content: Bit outdated at this point, had to update the tsconfig file to use top level await. Other than random bugs, good so far.
results.content_html: Bit outdated at this point, had to update the tsconfig file to use top level await. Other than random bugs, good so far.

results.content: This is an amazing course to learn some concepts about Deno with GraphQL. It's very code heavy, so prepare to dirty your hands on every lesson. There're some advanced topics but the instructor is very kind and always answers your questions quickly. He is also updating and upgrading the course.
